Title: Silverlight Hebrew & Arabic Language Support
Description: Bidirectional input support for Silverlight. Custom extension with classes, allows correct Hebrew and Arabic input and output for Silverlight controls.
HomeWiki:
Due to full RTL support in Silverlight 4 we will not maintain this project anymore. Huge respect for all contributers

  • Justin-Josef Angel for first implementation for Silverlight 1.1
  • Itai Bar-Haim: For Building the NBiDi Library. A .Net implementation of the BiDi (Bi-Directional) algorithm.
  • Yasser Makram and Santeon: For partially implementing Arabic NBiDi support, Arabic QA and some controls.
  • Tamir Khason: Which is me
  • Alex Golesh: Silverlight 3 RTW Adoptation
